item.sql: SELECT omr.omr_a_dvc_id, mpi.mpi_point_name FROM map_orbit_move_rltn omr INNER JOIN map_model_point_info mpi ON mpi.mpi_point_id = omr.omr_a_dvc_id WHERE omr.omr_cus_number =:cusNumber AND omr.omr_omg_id = :omg_id group by omr.omr_a_dvc_id,mpi.mpi_point_name UNION ALL SELECT omr.omr_a_dvc_id, r.rbd_name as mpi_point_name FROM map_orbit_move_rltn omr INNER JOIN dvc_rfid_base_dtls r ON r.rbd_id = omr.omr_a_dvc_id WHERE omr.omr_cus_number =:cusNumber AND omr.omr_omg_id = :omg_id group by omr.omr_a_dvc_id,r.rbd_name

SELECT omr.omr_b_dvc_id, mpi.mpi_point_name FROM map_orbit_move_rltn omr INNER JOIN map_model_point_info mpi ON mpi.mpi_point_id = omr.omr_b_dvc_id WHERE omr.omr_cus_number =:cusNumber AND omr.omr_omg_id = :omg_id group by omr.omr_b_dvc_id,mpi.mpi_point_name UNION ALL SELECT omr.omr_b_dvc_id, r.rbd_name as mpi_point_name FROM map_orbit_move_rltn omr INNER JOIN dvc_rfid_base_dtls r ON r.rbd_id = omr.omr_b_dvc_id WHERE omr.omr_cus_number =:cusNumber AND omr.omr_omg_id = :omg_id group by omr.omr_b_dvc_id,r.rbd_name
SELECT omp_pos_x AS x, omp_pos_y AS y, omp_pos_z AS z FROM map_orbit_move_points
item.where: WHERE omp_cus_number =:cusNumber AND omp_omg_id = :omg_id ORDER BY omp_seq

item.sql: SELECT omg_cus_number, omg_id, omg_origin_name, omg_destination_name, omg_remark, omg_create_uid, omg_create_datetime, omg_update_uid, omg_update_datetime FROM map_orbit_move_master

UPDATE map_orbit_move_master SET omg_origin_name =:omg_origin_name, omg_destination_name=:omg_destination_name, omg_remark=:omg_remark, omg_update_uid=:omg_update_uid, omg_update_datetime = SYSDATE, omg_view_id = :omg_view_id, omg_pos_x = :omg_pos_x, omg_pos_y = :omg_pos_y, omg_pos_z = :omg_pos_z, omg_rot_x = :omg_rot_x, omg_rot_y = :omg_rot_y, omg_rot_z = :omg_rot_z, omg_tar_x = :omg_tar_x, omg_tar_y = :omg_tar_y, omg_tar_z = :omg_tar_z WHERE omg_id = :omg_id

INSERT INTO map_orbit_move_master ( omg_cus_number, omg_id, omg_origin_name, omg_destination_name, omg_remark, omg_create_uid, omg_create_datetime, omg_update_uid, omg_update_datetime, omg_view_id, omg_pos_x, omg_pos_y, omg_pos_z, omg_rot_x, omg_rot_y, omg_rot_z, omg_tar_x, omg_tar_y, omg_tar_z ) VALUES ( :omg_cus_number, :omg_id, :omg_origin_name, :omg_destination_name, :omg_remark, :omg_create_uid, SYSDATE, :omg_update_uid, SYSDATE, :omg_view_id, :omg_pos_x, :omg_pos_y, :omg_pos_z, :omg_rot_x, :omg_rot_y, :omg_rot_z, :omg_tar_x, :omg_tar_y, :omg_tar_z )
INSERT INTO map_orbit_move_points ( omp_cus_number, omp_omg_id, omp_pos_x, omp_pos_y, omp_pos_z, omp_seq ) VALUES ( :omp_cus_number, :omp_omg_id, :omp_pos_x, :omp_pos_y, :omp_pos_z, :omp_seq )

INSERT INTO map_orbit_move_rltn ( omr_cus_number, omr_omg_id, omr_a_dvc_type, omr_a_dvc_id, omr_b_dvc_type, omr_b_dvc_id ) VALUES ( :omr_cus_number, :omr_omg_id, :omr_a_dvc_type, :omr_a_dvc_id, :omr_b_dvc_type, :omr_b_dvc_id )
